description: Play roulette with many friends in the world The French Roulette game is based on internationally accepted odds and game standards. The most obvious difference between French and American roulette is the game table layout and, of course, the odds! While an American roulette table displays both a single zero, and a double zero, the French table displays only the single zero. The colors of the numbers on the French roulette table are white, while all numbers except the zero and double zero on an American table are either red or black. The locations of the numbers on the roulette wheels in the French and American games also differ. The player odds in French roulette are much, much better than the odds in American roulette! Not only does the French game have just one zero, but players lose only 50% of their even-money wagers if the wheel stops on zero! This is known as the La Partage rule.

Language-learning app for preschoolers Make language come to life! This intuitive and colorful app for preschoolers is easy to understand through the combination of image and sound. Educational studies have shown that children of a young age are highly receptive to language learning and articulative expression. With LinguPinguin, curious children encounter a playful approach to learning foreign languages. Nine different visual worlds and a total of ninety funny objects are made available to explore. When tapped, each object comes to life with hilarious animated movements and sounds revealing the spoken word for the object in the native tongue or chosen foreign language. A creative language-learning adventure! Themes are: animals, transportation, food, body, farm, toys, nature, clothes, and apartment. NEW: THE LINGUPINGUIN QUIZ In the LinguPinguin Quiz all words are queried that were learned in the game. Up to 8 points can be collected. Depending on the result you will be rewarded with a funny animation. The LINGUPINGUIN QUIZ makes learning fun! Also for adult travelers, tourists or anyone interested in languages, LinguPinguin is an amusing tool to get in touch with a foreign language. The appealing illustrations and quality animations offered in this app were executed by the Elevision team, who offers other/more educational children apps in the App Store: "BioMio - My Firs Biology App", "PumiLumi - A Hide-And-Seek Adventure" and "MooPuu - The Animated Monster Puzzle" Visit LinguPinguin on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/lingupinguin

Photoelectric Effect is a well known principle of Quantum Theory, taught in the higher grades in science curriculum across the globe. Particle Nature of Electromagnetic Radiation is one of the fundamental principle on which Quantum Theory is based. This is lucidly explained by Photoelectric Effect, formulated by Einstein. The rules behind this effect can be summarized as: 1. No electrons are ejected, regardless of the intensity of the radiation, unless its frequency exceeds a threshold value characteristic of the metal. 2. The kinetic energy of the ejected electrons increases linearly with the frequency of the incident radiation but is independent of the intensity of the radiation. 3. Even at low light intensities, electrons are ejected immediately if the frequency is above the threshold. These observations suggest that the photoelectric effect depends on the ejection of an electron when it is undergoing a collision with a particle-like projectile (the radiation) that carries enough energy to eject the electron from the metal. If we suppose that the projectile is a photon of energy hv, where v is the frequency of the radiation, then the conservation of energy requires that the kinetic energy of the ejected electron should obey hν = φ + Kinetic Energy hν = φ + qVs where Vs is stopping potential. Here φ is the work function which is Planck’s constant times the threshold frequency (v0), a frequency below which the electrons cannot be ejected. Therefore, φ = hv0 This threshold frequency is the characteristic of the metal. Important Results: Increasing the frequency of the incident beam, keeping the number of incident photons fixed (this would result in a proportionate increase in energy) increases the maximum kinetic energy of the photoelectrons emitted. Thus,the stopping voltage increases. The number of electrons ejected also changes because the probability that each photon results in an emitted electron is a function of photon energy. If the intensity of the incident radiation is increased, there is no effect on the kinetic energies of the photoelectrons. Increase in intensity of incident beam (keeping the frequency fixed) increases the magnitude of the photoelectric current, though stopping voltage remains the same. Above the threshold frequency, the maximum kinetic energy of the emitted photoelectron depends on the frequency of the incident light, but is independent of the intensity of the incident light so long as the latter is not too high.

A superb virtual piano on mobile device! With piano accompaniment function to accompany songs : Pop, rock, latin, and many more! WARNING - Minimum requirements : - Dual core 1.0 Ghz - 512 RAM Please test Lite version before you buy. Features : - Single or dual mode (top and bottom), useful on tablets - HQ 44kHz stereo sound - 25 Styles available, for genres : Pop, rock, waltz, ballad, vintage, bossa, country, rock and roll. - Configurable tempo - Pre-added small reverb to each note - Up to 31 notes of polyphonic - Multitouch playing - 3 levels of note velocity : Soft, normal, hard. Change it in real time while playing - 88 full range of notes - Transpose -12 to +12 - Default sustain polarity On/Off - Sustain pedal On/Off - Octave piano play, useful when playing Pop pianos, salsa or samba - Virtual key press feedback - Limitations in Lite version : * Cannot change tempo * Cannot change note velocity * Cannot change transpose * Cannot play octave mode * Cannot use dual keyboard mode Please check lite version before you buy the full version. Please give any comments or buglist to kristoradionpurba@gmail.com , I'll fix it ASAP.. Keyword : virtual, piano, hq, accompaniment, transpose, velocity, octave, dual mode

Description : Sokoban is a type of transport puzzle video game, in which you have to push boxes in a warehouse. You can push the boxes but you cannot pull them, and you can only push one box at a time. The goal is to push all the available boxes to the designated locations (Targets). To move around in the warehouse slide your finger across the screen in the desired direction. If you find out that one level is difficult to finish, you can look at its solution. Features: ★ The game contains more than 700 levels for free. ★ The game contains the solution for each level. ★ The game utilizes the services of Google Play Game to win achievements and compare score of the game with other players worldwide. ★ Option to enable or disable the sound. ★ Undo function, which means you can undo a bad move. ★ The guide for how to play the game ★ Several language: French , English. Supported by unobtrusive Ads . We hope you enjoy the Sokoban game! Good game :-)

This free app consists of 3 useful electricity tools, an electrical calculator, an electrical circuit calculator and electrical formulas. Electrical calculator: You are able to calculate the most important electrical sizes. You can calculate the electrical power, electrical resistance, electrical charge, electrical work and electrical current. Electrical circuit: You are able to calculate the current in parallel circuits (both total and partial), the voltage in series circuits (both total and partial) and the resistance in parallel and series circuits. Electrical formulas: You can see the formulas for the electrical power, electrical resistance, electrical work, electrical current and electrical charge. Electrical engineering Books: You can see a list of the best books and buy them. Electrical engineering E-Books: You can see a list of the best e-books and buy them. Other calculators: You can also calculate the battery lifetime, the stored energy in a capacitor, the inductance and the capacitance, the output voltage of a voltage divider. The best app for school, college and work! If you are a student it will helps to learn. Note: Electrical engineering covers a wide range of subfields including electronics, digital computers, power engineering, telecommunications, control systems, radio frequency engineering, and signal processing.

description: Feel like your favorite hero with the OFFICIAL The Amazing Spider-Man 2 Live Wallpaper. Marvel Comics and Spider-Man fans can recreate the excitement of the hit movie with this incredible Live Wallpaper app, exclusively for Android! Get ready for high flying, web swinging action directly on your home screen! Download the free version of the The Amazing Spider-Man 2 Live Wallpaper, based on the Marvel / Columbia Pictures sequel, featuring a close-up of Spidey’s chest logo on his costume! You can unlock the premium version of the Live Wallpaper featuring a fully animated and interactive 3D model of the ol’ web-head, Spider-Man, wearing his costume based on the hit film The Amazing Spider-Man 2! “You say you don't want the responsibility? Guess what? People like us... We don't get a choice.” – Spider-Man Pay close attention to the spider logo on Spider-Man’s chest as his Spidey Sense “tingles”, which doubles as a battery gauge for your Android device! Watch as it shoots and flickers with bright bolts of Spidey Sense when your device’s battery is full and then gradually dims as your power depletes. When your device gets close to zero power your free battery gauge’s Spider-Man chest logo will flash red and the Spider-Man will provide audio assistance reminding you to plug in your device! If that isn’t enough Spidey action for you, than an upgrade is in order via several unlockable premium options. Once unlocked and onscreen, you can tap Spider-Man to invoke several awesome animations. Also, to help you over-come any potential threats to NYC, the web-slinger will deliver you email, missed call and text alerts in the form of a web blast covering your entire screen! If you’re feeling like a casualty of wasted time, unlock the premium Clock Widget, which features the day, time and local weather as well as the voice of the wise cracking web-head, Spider-Man. Hear the hero in red and blue recite the time for you as well as little surprises here and there for you to discover while the Amazing Spider-Man 2 Clock Widget is set to your home screen. Are you ready to protect New York City, the world and your Android device? Then unlock the Sticker Widget pack and place the ol’ web-slinger, Spider-Man, (3 different poses available), anywhere on your home screen! Is your spidey sense still not tingling enough..? There’s an unlockable premium custom keyboard skin featuring Spider-Man, the pride of NYC, who’s here to aid you in all your web-slinging texting missions! Even the most deranged Oscorp villain isn’t going to be able to stand up to the super strength this app wields, making your Android phone or tablet the most heroic device around. The whole world’s going to be watching, (and downloading), The Amazing Spider-Man 2… Don’t miss out on the web-slinging excitement; download today! Fully optimized for devices and tablets. The Amazing Spider-Man 2 Live Wallpaper uses READ_SMS and READ_CALL_LOGS to enable the ol’ webhead to help you stay up-to-date with all of your device’s incoming texts and missed calls. If you have unlocked the 3D version of Spider-Man, he will deliver animated alerts for both new texts and missed calls directly on your homescreen! description: Alle Informationen für Lesben & Schwulen inklusive CITYGUIDE für Ihre Hosentasche. Zugereiste profitieren auch von der Behördensuche. Die Queer-App-Berlin bietet seinen Nutzern jederzeit aktuelle Informationen über die Stadt und alles, was dort passiert. Viele Geschäfte und Restaurants können hier auch von innen besichtigt werden. Weitere Features des CITYGUIDE’s sind die ArroundMe-Funktion, Schlagwort- und Kategorie-Suche wie auch 360° Panoramas. Jetzt kostenlos die Queer-App-Berlin downloaden! Die Lauffähigkeit aller multimedialen Funktionen (z.B. 360° Panorama) wird erst ab der Android Version 4.0.3 gewährleistet! All information for lesbians & gays included CITYGUIDE your pocket. In CITYGUIDE not only financial information is stored but also guided tours and virtual tours. Here you will find not only a detailed business directory for the local economy, there is also still historical data and facts about the city / town / district, important dates on the spot and local weather forecasts. Newcomers benefit from the authorities search. The Queer-App Berlin offers users instant access to current information about the city and everything that happens there. Many shops and restaurants can also be visited from the inside here. Other features of CITYGUIDE's are the ArroundMe function, keyword and category search, as well as 360 ° panoramas. Now free download the Queer-App Berlin! The runnability of all multimedia functions (eg 360 ° Panorama) is guaranteed until the Android version 4.0.3!

Our classic music player gets a facelift along with new features - all for free! * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * - Cloudskipper 2.0 is designed for Android 4.0.3 & later. - Earlier devices should still be able to use the old version - all free, ad free <(^_^)> PERMISSION INFO: ** Full details coming soon ** camera: to use the LED camera light KNOWN ISSUES: lots - this is a work in progress ★ Anything else? Got ideas? Please tell us: hi@cloud.tv "> hi@cloud.tv ♥ We respond to everyone! * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * CLOUDSKIPPER MUSIC PLAYER Library Features - swipe-based navigation - create and edit playlists - delete tracks, albums, etc. - persistent mini-player - intuitive UI Audio Player - NEW notification player (safe to use with no promo spam!) - NEW audio ducking - NEW thumb-happy UI - controls fade out when not in use - EQ - click for on/off, long press to open - play / prev / next - long press for rwd / ffwd - loop & shuffle - playback scrubber - large album artwork Lock Screen - playback controls - Camera & LED flashlight - on-screen volume & mute - silent / vibrate toggle - playlist count - album artwork, track name, and artist - play/pause, rewind, fast forward Widgets - 1x1, 2x1, 4x1, 4x2, 4x4 About Us We're Mike and Radley, a couple of music fans who build Android apps for a living. We wanted to build the most fun, efficient, hassle free music player we could imagine.
release_text: 2.0.4 - Bug fixes 2.0.3 (public beta) - EQ preset fix - fix for multiple activities - had to turn off playlist deletion due to major Samsung music bug 2.0 - 2.0.2 - new UI - audio ducking - lots of bugs (sorry) - fix for crash on pre-JellyBean devices - fix for Add to Playlist - fix for large tablet icons - added Crashlytics Known issue: must stop music before closing app Work in progress. Still working out bugs. Apologies for the big hassle.

description: "The execution is great, but what’s really impressive about the app is the options and customization." - Android Police "Supposing you’ve got a tablet just gathering dust in a closet – Dayframe has a use that’s beyond easy to implement." - Slashgear "Dayframe features more options than you can shake a stick at. It’s like Facebook Home but without all the suck." - Phandroid ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ♥ Chromecast slideshow now free for ALL users ★ Upgrade to Prime (in app purchase) for advanced features ★ UNIVERSAL app made for tablets and phones. No need to purchase again. ★ Feedback? Questions? Ping us: hi@cloud.tv "> hi@cloud.tv ♥ We respond to everyone! ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ° ★ Interactive Chromecast Slideshow Dayframe 2.0 is the premiere photo viewer / slideshow app for Chromecast. Be the first to play photos, albums, photostreams, and playlists of albums and photostreams on your HDTV. We wanted to make something you could touch and feel. So it's not just play and sit back - it's interactive! You can control what's playing on Chromecast by swiping forwards and backwards, zoom to fit or fill, pause, shuffle, and even like photos. ★ All of Your Photos in One Place Dayframe works with your favorite photo sharing services to provide a ongoing slideshow of friends, family, and interests. Browse and share photos between Facebook, Instagram, Tumblr, Google+, Dropbox, Flickr, Twitter, 500px, and more. ★ Ultimate Photo Frame Put your device on a stand and let it play an endless stream of all your photos. Dayframe routinely checks for updates so you always have what's new without effort. ★ Self-Managed Convenience Dayframe is designed to automatically play when you’re not using your device. Once you’re set up, that’s it. Dayframe takes care of everything. No check-ins, no remembering, just set it and forget it. ★ Screensaver Timer You pick the best time to play as a screensaver, along with settings for network, battery level, and power source. The app won’t run all night or drain your battery / bandwidth. ★ Old Tablets are Awesome! Dayframe is excellent for re-purposing old tablets. Set up a tablet in your kitchen, living room, bedroom, or anywhere you want a powerful photo frame that doubles as web browser, remote control, and shareable device. ★ Upgrade to Dayframe Prime Get Chromecast photos, custom playlists, shuffle mode, advanced screensaver timer, brightness timer, app timer, local weather, and more! APP FEATURES: - fully automated slideshow / photo frame - Chromecast photos / slideshow - all-in-one Facebook, Instagram, Tumblr, Google+, Dropbox, Flickr, Twitter, 500px, and more - smart auto-player - screensaver timer w/ power settings - custom playlist - photo gallery - unlimited photostreams - left & right side menus - immersive mode - onboarding & discovery - built-in guides - KITKAT native (built on sdk 19) PRIME (in app purchase upgrade) includes: - custom playlists - shuffle mode - current weather - screensaver timers - brightness timer - "open an app" timer - remove Chromecast player logo and reminder FINE_LOCATION permission: used for Instagram live party pics About Us We're Mike & Radley and we've been making fun Android apps for a few years, including HD Widgets and Cloudskipper.
release_text: New in 3.1 - navigation menu fix - Google login fix New in Dayframe 3.0: - new Material design - new loop single stream & shuffle buttons - new Device Admin permission (required for timers) - update to Facebook Graph 2.0* - bug fixes * less features, more secure, required by Facebook

The BMO Retirement App is a read-only App that lets you view your retirement account and current plan information any time from your Android™ smartphone. To complete transactions in your account, please visit mybmoretirement.com. With the BMO Retirement App, you get hands-on access to your retirement savings. - Check your account balances - View investment price/performance - Review contribution rates - See how your account is currently allocated - View your personal rate of return - Verify loan balances - Look at your account activity Your account’s security is important to us. You are required to have established a User ID and Password on the mybmoretirement.com website prior to accessing the mobile App. Once a User ID and Password have been established, the same credentials will apply to both the website and mobile App. For questions or additional information about your retirement plan, please choose the most convenient way of contacting us. This information is also available in the App by tapping the “i” Info icon. - Call the My BMO Retirement Line at 1-800-858-3829. For the automated telephone service to access your retirement plan account information, press 1. To speak to a BMO Retirement Services Specialist, press 2. Call us 24 hours a day, seven days a week at your convenience. - Email a BMO Retirement Services Specialist at mybmoretirement@bmo.com . A BMO Retirement Services Specialist will reply within 24-48 hours during the normal business week. Please be aware the email you are sending is not secure, so don't include confidential information such as passwords, account numbers and Social Security Numbers.

Practice speaking, reading, listening and writing. Play a game, answer questions and complete lessons to improve your vocabulary and grammar. Start with basic verbs, phrases, and sentences, and learn new words daily. • Editor's Choice and "Best of the Best” —Google Play • "The best language-learning app" —The Wall Street Journal • “This free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I’ve tried… lessons come in the form of brief challenges — speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions — that keep me coming back for more.” —The New York Times Our most popular language courses are: • English for Spanish speakers (60M learners) • Spanish for English speakers (50M learners) • French for English speakers (30M learners) Our fastest growing language courses are: • English for French speakers (8M learners) • German for French speakers (100K learners) • It's free. No fees, no ads. • It's fun. Learn by playing a game — practice new words by doing quick lessons and answering questions daily. • It's effective. 34 hours of Duolingo are equivalent to a semester of university-level education. Millions of students use Duolingo to study and learn in language classes at school! Duolingo is the best way to learn to read, listen, write and speak English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Russian, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish or Turkish.

add to favorite will appear in your personalized stream • Support for 15 languages even if your phone doesn't support the language & font • Get Local News from Indian districts & towns, world news, weather, horoscopes & stock updates • Opt in to get notifications of Breaking News • Set text size & background color as per your preference • Share News over SMS, Whatsapp, Email, Facebook or any other app you have installed • Hundreds of licensed partners DAILYHUNT EXAM PREPARATIONS • Exam Preparation provides mock tests, solved papers & study material for government exams in India - description: Access, manage and share your files at 4shared with others. Free mobile application 4shared for Android is a convenient and fast way to access your account at 4shared.com, including all documents, photos, music, etc. directly from your Android device whenever you wish to. The convenient public search option allows you to search for and find the file you need within the massive 4shared file database. It’s also simple to define various search filters (upload time, size, type of file, etc.) to get the best results and add the necessary file to your own account at 4shared.com. With 4shared for Android you can easily copy, move, rename, delete, upload and download any files from your account at 4shared.com on your smartphone or tablet and share them with your colleagues, relatives and friends. 4shared for Android enables: • Fast and convenient access to 30,000,000+ files. • User-friendly search within massive 4shared database with an option to instantly add the found files to your account. • A possibility to manage your account at 4shared.com, listen to music and even watch videos directly on your Android device. • Instant sharing of files from your 4shared account via the app.
release_text: - New feature: text files preview - Music player UI and functionality: improvements - Server connection checker: logic improvements - Search functionality UI: issues fix - External SD card: issues fix - Notifications: issues fix

description: Nutrition90 is a helpful companion application for anyone undertaking a 90-day extreme fitness program. Keep track of your nutritional intake based on the current phase of the program, as well as your current nutrition level. Also functions as a journal, letting you keep notes for each day of the program along with photos, to give you a visual log of just how well the program is working! The handy history calendar lets you go back to any day and review your nutritional intake, as well as edit those days. You can fill in days you missed, or get caught up if you're already in the program. And with the push of a button, you can email yourself a complete log of your progress at any time! The developers of Nutrition90 are in no way affiliated with Beachbody or Product Partners, LLC, creators of P90X® and other extreme fitness programs.
release_text: New Features: Portion lists are back, now fully customizable! Estimated calories are now shown in Portions and Email Log Fixes: Crash when accessing preferences for days other than the current day Other: Cleaned up the camera code to prevent crashes Cleaned up database code to improve stability

description: Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. MS Earth Science Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning Earth Science . Tis app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. MS Earth Science Buddy is not only an app for learning Earth Science but also an app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. The features of this app include everything you need to prepare for middle school biology. 1. This app includes attractive lessons on all topics below. 2. interactive Fun quizzes by topic 3. Daily Earth Science and science news updates. 4. Sharing through email 5. Fun videos from youtube. 6. Flash cards by topic. 7. Note taking tool This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a middle school life science or to present a lesson. All the buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

developer: NSW Department of Education and Communities
description: Do you struggle to understand your child's homework? Does your child need to practise their spelling and times tables? Are you looking for inspiration for projects and assignments? The School A to Z app is an essential tool for every parent of school-aged children. Produced by the NSW Department of Education and Communities, the School A to Z app brings together a wealth of resources to help parents to understand and support their child's homework. See www.schoolatoz.com.au for more useful student and parent resources. Features · Our English A to Z has more than 350 definitions of commonly-used English terms from primary and high school. Each word has an easy-to-understand definition based on the current school curriculum, with graphic illustrations and help sheets to help you. · With nearly 300 definitions, our Maths A to Z will help you to understand what is happening in your child's classroom. Each word has an easy-to-understand definition based on the current school curriculum, with graphic illustrations, help sheets and 'how to' videos to help you support your child. · Technology is changing at an ever-increasing pace and - as a parent - it is not always easy to keep up with the latest trends and terminology. Our Technology A to Z explains these terms in language that you can understand. · Our 'Spelling Bee game' provides hours of spelling fun for children of all ages. The Spelling Bee game is powered by words from Australia's national dictionary, the Macquarie Dictionary (Macquarie Dictionary Data (c) Macquarie Dictionary Publishers, 2012). There are three levels of difficulty and a leader board to track progress and improvement. Children can even create their own games for their spelling homework. · If your child needs help with their times tables, then the Maths Monkey Times Tables challenge is sure to be a winner. Your child has to get the most number of correct answers before all of the bananas fall. Children can choose which number they want to practise and there is also a random game to keep them guessing. · Does your child have an assignment due tomorrow and you don't know where to start? We have prepared some assignment starters for common classroom topics and themes to point you in the right direction. If you are looking for an easy-to-use guide to help your child with their homework, then this is the app for you!
release_text: Videos stop playing when leaving the app - and resume when coming back to the app. Made available for more devices.

description: Photobooth is a utility for joining multiple photos together into a single image for easy sharing online. You can import photos from the gallery or capture new pictures directly from the camera to create a custom photostrip in just seconds. You can easily change the layout, order, and output size and share to Twitter, Flickr, Google+, or Facebook in just a few clicks. What Photobooth DOES Choose from vertical or horizontal layouts (more coming soon) Order photos by ASC, DESC, or random Export photostrip in S, M, or L size (XL coming soon) Share to your other favorite apps with the power of intents Looks damn sexy What Photobooth DOES NOT do Add styles, filters, or effects Add silly stickers and captions Host your images online (all sharing is handled by 3rd party apps) Why Photobooth exists Photobooth was born out of a desire to quickly share multiple photos in a single tweet. Often I attend tech events or concerts and I always find myself with a handful of photos worth sharing and I was disappointed by my current Android options. I wanted a single URL, with the images unobstructed by effects or the sharing service itself. The solution is Photobooth, a no nonsense utility that lets you share multiple photos to your prefered service easier than ever before. Photobooth required two permissions, local storage for saving photostrips and network connection for reporting crashes, that's all.
release_text: By popular demand, a save button has been added. You can now save photostrips directly to the SD card if you're not in a social mood. Enjoy!

description: Podkicker is one of the most popular podcast managers for android. ★ This is the pro version of podkicker that has NO ADS and will receive new features before everyone else. ★ Minimalistic, fast and efficient ★ Audio and video support. ★ Chromecast support (beta). ★ Flattr integration. ★ Transfer of downloads to dropbox or similar. ★ Dedicated search engine containing 260.000+ podcasts. ★ Automatic downloads and rich notifications. ★ Podcast suggestions based on current subscriptions. ★ Carmode when driving. ★ Sleeptimer. ★ Categories. ★ Frequent updates. If you have problems or feature requests, just drop me an email and we'll figure it out. A quickstart to get you going: The Channel tab lists the podcasts you currently subscribe to. The Episode tab lists the 200 latest episodes from all your subscriptions. The Downloads tab lists the episodes you have downloaded to your device. The rest should be quite self explanatory.

The object of the game is to defend your base against waves of incoming enemies. Buy troops with your limited points, but place them wisely; they have specific behaviors, and a wrong placement now could spell doom for you in future waves! Unlock different kinds of troops to keep up with your foe. How long can you survive? Features -Play a real-time tower defense game -Place your troops wisely to defend your base -Unlock a variety of unit types

description: The programme for speed reading and memory development. Download the course of speed reading ReadRace and start to read more quickly, and so to think more quickly. It is rather simple to learn speed reading, everyone can do it. Speed reading is a habit of perception of text information, and also speed of its understanding and learning. Developing the skill of speed reading you considerably develop speed of information perception, actively train your attention, improve your memory, and speed of your mental processing increases by 2-3 times. The regular practice of speed reading also improves general intelligence level. It is known that many successful people have the skill of speed reading. Thanks to it they can perceive information more quickly, save time for searching the necessary information in a text, and, therefore, they make decisions more quickly. Now you can do it as well. Study and gradually increase speed of delivery of text information, and you will create a new habit of thinking and fast perception of information. Exercises for development of speed reading ReadRace and specially developed algorithm of delivery of information will help you. The new Read Race program has united functions of the speed reading trainer and e-book reader. Load electronic books and text information in any language and study using your computer or mobile device. Train with ReadRace and read in a speed reading mode in your native or any foreign language!

You need to find the right apartment - like, yesterday. It’s got to have specific amenities and be within your budget. Rent.com is here to help. The Rent.com mobile app allows you to: • Find out what residents think of the property - read real ratings and reviews you can trust from actual residents. • Explore trusted listings from sources that are verified by Rent.com. • Check out listings stamped with our Legit badge - they’ve been personally visited or otherwise vetted by us. • Take a virtual tour with our exclusive HD videos and panoramic tours with 360-degree views of the exteriors, interiors, and amenities of select apartments. • View HD apartment photos and floor-plan images for a glimpse of what each unit has to offer. • Use advanced search tools and filters to narrow in on your perfect rental. • Find apartments in specific locations using a map or text view of listings. • Save your favorites to My Rent to easily access them again and again. • Call or email apartments directly from the app. • Send your Renter Card to apartments and stand out from other renters. • View available visit times and book the one that works for you - finally, the days of unanswered calls and back-and-forth are over! The perfect apartment within your budget is out there. Use the Rent.com app to help you find it.
release_text: Book a visit straight from the app.

Sansan has more than 4,000 premium corporate users, using both Smartphone and PC applications, in Japan and beyond. Sansan has the potential to increase business productivity, together with business opportunities, via the sharing of connections within your company. Sansan is a cloud based contact management system with which you can digitize your business cards with almost flawless accuracy and share contact information with your colleagues. Save time and maximize your business opportunities. Merely by scanning them, you can get the most out of your business cards, both via mobile and PC. Whether you are a B2B business trying to connect with a target client, or a venture looking to transform a lifeless stack of received business cards into potential investors, Sansan can help you realize potential by merely sharing business cards, and the contacts contained within, with your colleagues. Discovering Sansan for the first time? Invited by a colleague? Here’s what Sansan can do! ■Features: • Digitize : Our input staff will manually digitize your business cards with 99% accuracy. Just take a picture, and you’re done. • Manage : Tag, log and review both your own and your colleagues’ contacts from your phone or PC. • Share : Easily share your contacts with your colleagues. You can search common records to see if someone has spoken to a given person, and when, to ensure a cohesive approach to your business. • Contact : Contact people using email or phone apps, or send bulk emails to multiple contacts with one-touch links. • Download : Export your business card data as CSVs and leverage the data in innovative ways. • Security : Sansan is a holder of the “Privacy Mark,” puts security above all else, and is trusted by over 4,000 companies presently using the product. [New Sansan Users] For users trying Sansan for the first time, register a new account using your company email address. *** (Please note, we do not accept registration using free domains such as Gmail and Yahoo). [Users Invited By Colleagues] For users who were invited by their colleagues, download Sansan and sign in to the app using your registered domain email address and password. --- Business Card Management for your company Sansan
release_text: * Some minor bugs have been fixed * Modifications have been made for the sign in screen

description: Songsterr is a tab app with instant access to 500,000 high quality guitar, bass and drum tabs & chords. When you buy the app, you get unlimited lifetime access to all the tabs & chords from songsterr.com website. FEATURES Tabs & Chords • Huge catalogue of accurate tabs from Songsterr.com. Unlimited instant access to 500,000 tabs & chords. • High transcription quality. There is only one version of tab per song. • Legality. Music creators get paid. Tab Player • Realistic Guitar Engine. Learn and play along with Songsterr. • Multiple Instruments. Most songs have tabs for individual instruments (guitar, bass, drums, vocal, etc). • Multi Speed Playback. Slow down tab playback to learn difficult parts. • Loop. Play back selected measures over and over again. • Offline Mode. View and playback previously opened tabs offline. • Solo. Hear just the instrument you are learning. • Count in. Gives you time to prepare yourself for playing after tapping Play. Navigation • History. Instantly access tabs you viewed recently. • Favorites. Quickly access your favorite tabs. • Favorites Syncing. Sign in with your songsterr.com account to synchronize favorites with website. Price • No hidden fees. All-in-one app with unlimited lifetime access to all the tabs & chords.

description: Screen Rotation Toggle control our user says-- Excellent ! It was exactly what I was looking ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Customize your screen rotation for every installed application.It gives you list of all installed application on your cellphone ,for every installed app you can customize the screen orientation that in which default orientation you want to open the given application if that default orientation is supported by you app . Just you have to select option among portrait,landscape,and auto(sensor based) and then press at the top most ON button. After starting the service whenever you will open your application it will be opened in screen orientation set by you in this app if that orientation is supported by that app.. If you want to remove custom screen rotation just press the top most button again it will turn of this app service and you can use you phone setting whatever it is. This tool gives you power to define screen rotation for each and every application of yours. if you want auto-rotate for some app,and for some app portrait and landscape screen orientation then use this app just click on check box and turn on the app you are done. OR just save the custom orientation for Application and turn the app on whenever required. Manages every app individually,and toggles the scree according to your need. it locks the screen in given orientation for every application. One of our user says-- Excellent ! Very useful and unique app, saves us from manually rotating the phone endless times, now even better after last update to sort apps list. Responsive developer attends suggestions, highly recommended ! description: Interactive Steampunk skull Live wallpaper- Touch the skull to make the the bio-mechanical clockwork skull move, jaws open and gears rotate. NO ADS! Now with real steam and Gear sounds!! Steampunk refers to a subgenre of science fiction and sometimes fantasy that incorporates technology and clothing designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery. If Jules Verne or H.G. Wells were writing their science fiction today, it would be considered “steampunk.” Classic "Death Card" theme for fans of Steampunk, Cyberpunk, Science fiction, Sci-Fi and retro tech goth. • Press the center of the skull to activate gears and steam on the background live wall paper • You can turn Steampunk sounds ON or Off in settings (defaults to Off) • Classic steampunk design theme for fans of Steampunk, Steam punk gears, Cyberpunk, Science fiction, Sci-Fi and retro tech goth. • If you like this, you will also like my Steampunk Gears Live Wallpaper • TO INSTALL: Home -> Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers- Steampunk Live Wallpaper Skull

** PLEASE NOTE: CURRENTLY REQUIRES YOUR SCHOOL TO USE THE FIREFLY LEARNING PLATFORM ** Student Planner integrates with your school's Firefly Learning Platform so you can access your timetable and homework from your Android phone. Automatically populated from your school timetable so you don't need to enter any of your classes, and teachers can push homework directly to your planner. You can also manually add your own homework or other tasks and associate them with particular lessons and teachers. These automatically synchronise with your account on your school's Firefly Learning Platform. Features include: - View your school timetable - See homework set by your teachers - Add your own homework and tasks - Receive push notifications when teachers set you new tasks, send you messages or send you links - Access your school's Firefly system without having to log in again Please note: you will need to know your school's code to log in for the first time. Ask your teacher or network administrator if you are not sure what it is. Make suggestions and keep up to date as we develop the app by following @fireflyteam at http://twitter.com/fireflyteam The Android version of Student Planner requires your school to be running Firefly 4.0.14 or higher.
release_text: Fixed an issue with ampersands and newlines cutting off text in task descriptions.

Incluye un widget para que fichar te resulte más fácil. The application lets you control lathe time you've been working easily. It also lets you export data in various formats for further processing. Includes a widget for you to sign easier.

description: Enjoy the benefits of an indoor cycling class in the convenient form of an Android application, with Indoor Cycling Coach. Build stamina, strength, speed and endurance, using routines designed to maximise the productivity of your workout. Choose the routine type, choose the duration, choose a playlist of tunes...and then you're good to go. Indoor Cycling Coach will display the RPM at which you should be pedalling and the amount of resistance you should be using. Adjust the resistance level of your bike to the indicated degree of difficulty, and match your pedal speed with that of the on-screen wheel. Like a real indoor cycling class the instructions will change at set periods, to simulate the efforts required for, say, a gruelling up-hill climb, a thigh-burning sprint, or a simple, gentle warm-up. The routines contained within Indoor Cycling Coach are dynamically generated, dependent on the type and duration of the routine you select. These routines were designed by Simon Reynolds, who, through the benefits of indoor cycling combined with a carefully controlled diet guided by the LighterLife* programme, shed 16 stone in 6 months. By practically halving his initial 33 stone body weight, Simon has become an ambassador for the world of indoor cycling, and Indoor Cycling Coach is his way of spreading the benefits to others. * For more information on LighterLife, please visit www.lighterlife.com. NB. Certain devices (for example, the Samsung Galaxy S2 pre ICS) have a default media player app which does not create music playlists correctly. This is a known flaw in these devices, which will mean that these playlists will not be available within Indoor Cycling Coach. The accepted workaround is to download an alternative media player application (we recommend Winamp Free) and use that to create your playlists instead. For more information please read: http://flemmingbob.blogspot.com/2012/04/my-samsung-galaxy-s2-wont-find-my.html
release_text: Latest android release permission fix for nexus series mobile phones. Improvements for image caching.

description: Download our new and improved ULTA app to take your love for beauty and everything fabulous on the go with our effortless new mobile experience! View our special offers and savings and easily access your ULTAmate Rewards information. It's easier than ever to see what's new and shop for everything beauty conveniently from your phone! • Shop quickly – fast, seamless checkout means super-speedy shopping anytime, anywhere • Access your ULTAmate Rewards account for full account details including easy access to your points balance and rewards number • Access your ULTA.com account to see your past purchases and favorite products • Buy products and gift cards, read reviews, discover exclusive offers and more • Search for information by category, brand, price, top-selling, and new arrivals • Scan your favorite product to gather info, ratings and reviews and product Q&A while shopping in our stores • Use your GPS or enter a ZIP code to find nearby stores • Share your favorite products and fabulous looks, even upload your own photos! • Access our weekly ad and mailers for latest sales, exclusive offers, and fabulous new products

---This is a version for beta-testers, please don't rate it low. This game is under heavy development so several updates a day will be expected--- A new era of Music Quiz Games as just begun!!! Remember the old times when Music Quiz Games were based on questions or on your SD-Card Music? Those times are over!!!! In Ultimate Music Quiz you can play with musics from a Last.fm Username, a Artist/Band or from a Last.fm Tag. For example, if you choose tho play with the tag Rock or Pop the songs that you have to guess are that ones that were tagged in Last.fm as Rock or Pop. Are you a 60s or 80s music lover? Just choose 60s or 80s as the tag. Here you can see the Top Tags in Last.fm ( http://www.last.fm/charts/toptags ) Known Issues: - In time when passing from 01 to 00 it takes 2 seconds - It's only optimized for HVGA (320x480) - Sometimes appears songs that are not related with the tag, or artist - If the name as a & sometimes don't appear the text after the & - Some state buttons images are missing - In artist game mode sometimes it gets stuck, you have to go back several times to give force close or kill the app - Some songs appear repeatedly in one game - The Options button does not work --ATTENTION - Each game of UMQ generates about 20MB of data, so it recommended that you use a Wi-fi connection-- The High Scores are powered by ScoreLoop and this Game is Ad Supported. In final version High Scores will be reseted. I want to make Ultimate Music Quiz the best Music Quiz for Android, and for that I'll need your help. All feedback are welcome and will be taken in consideration even in Android Market Comments. description: urecy(ウレシイ)はカップル、友だち、家族などプライベート向けのグループ共有アプリです。 グループ内ではカレンダーでスケジュール共有、メモや写真の共有、ツイートができます。 ************************* こんな人におすすめ ************************* 家族でスケジュール共有をしたい 夫婦で家事、育児の予定を分担したい 夫婦で子供の予定を共有したい カップル同士でスケジュールや記念日を共有をしたい 職場でお客さまの予約状況を共有したい 友だちと部活やサークルなどのスケジュールを共有したい 限られた人だけでコミュニケーションのとれるスペースが欲しい ************************* 特徴 ************************* ■コルクボードでメモや写真を共有 コルクボードにはメモ、写真を貼り付けてグループのメンバーで共有ができます。 コルクボードに貼付けることでタイムラインのようにあっという間に流れてしまう事がありません。 スケジュール調整や連絡の告知など使い方は自由です。 ■カレンダーで予定を共有 カレンダーを使えばグループのメンバーと簡単に予定を共有できます。 友達の予定を確認済みにマークするとき、自分のiPhoneのカレンダーにも保存することもできるので、 ネットにつながらない場合に確認できて便利です。 ■手書きツイートで感情豊かなコミュニケーション 手書き機能でカラフルで感情豊かなツイートができるようになりました。 テキストだけでは物足りない！そんなときは手書きツイートを作ってみましょう。 おなじみの顔文字もカラフルに自由にレイアウトできるので、より感情豊かなコミュニケーションができます。 ■10人まで urecy(ウレシイ)は友だち、カップル、家族、夫婦などプライベートな関係向けに作られています。 そのため、グループは最大10人の人数制限があります。 ココだけの話は気の許せる人たちと楽しみましょう。 ■フェードアウト機能 何かしらの理由で疎遠になってしまったグループからは自然にフェードアウトします。 グループ内でのツイート、コルクボードへの貼付けなどの活動(アクティビティ)が一定期間無い場合、フェードアウトの対象となります。 進学、引っ越し、転職など人生の転機に出会いと別れはつきものです。 urecyはユーザーのリアルな人間関係に自然にフィットするようになっています。 ************************* 機能 ************************* グループ毎に以下のことができます。 ・手書きツイート NEW! ・添付画像を手書き編集 NEW! ・ツイート ・ツイートに写真を添付 ・ツイートに位置情報を付ける ・カレンダーでスケジュールの共有 ・スケジュールを端末のカレンダーに登録 ・コルクボードでテキストメモの共有 ・コルクボードで写真の共有 ・お知らせ グループ内で発生した各種イベントがお知らせとして通知されます。 urecy (nice) is a group of private sharing app for couples, friends, and family. description: Teacher Review "As a teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad,. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. U.S. History Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning history. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. U.S. History Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning U.S. History but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. This app is the ultimate learning tool for all students taking U.S. History. This app covers all topics in NYS regents US history and AP US history. This app gives the opportunity to study and become very knowledgeable about US history. This app includes Topics covered on this app are: 1. US Geography 2. 1792-1800 Election Results 3. French and Indian War 4. Road to Revolution 5. American Revolution 6. War Of 1812 7. Era Of Good Feeling 8. Early 19c America 9. Andrew Jackson 10. Chesapeake Colonization 11. Election Of 1840 12. Restoration Colonies 13. New England Colonization 14. Antebellum American Art 15. Antebellum Reformers 16. Antebellum South 17. IndustrializationIn America 18. Election Of 1844 19. 1850s Road To Secession 20. Manifest Destiny 21. Civil War 22. Atrocities Of The Civil War 23. Late 19c Urbanization 24. Reconstruction 25. Gilded Age Politics 26. Populism and the Election of 1896 27. Rise Of Big Business 28. Growth Of The Labor Movement 29. America an Imperial Power 30. Life In Gilded Age NYC 31. American Foreign Policy 1920-1941 32. Beginning of Cold War 33. Eisenhower-Foreign Policy 34. Election Of 1912 35. Closing The Western Frontier 36. 1950s American Culture 37. The Vietnam War This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a regents or to present a lesson. All the regents buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

description: Celestial Navigator is a must have app for mariners and any other person interested in celestial navigation. It features a rise set and merpass calculator, a line of position and compass error including gyro calculator , a celestial fix calculator (with auto run up and dead reckoning),an almanac of sun,moon,planets and 58 navigational stars.It supports the three most widely used navigational methods for calculation of lines of position i.e. intercept,long by chronometer and latitude by meridian altitude. It also features a true wind calculator (giving wind speed and direction,dew point and relative humidity),an eta calculator (multiple results are shown at a time depending upon the user settings),a sailing calculator featuring great circle and Mercator sailing calculators along with intermediate point calculator. It also displays the device's position(lat,long,speed,cog) from the GPS and the compass heading. The accuracy of the results displayed has been thoroughly tested with the US navy website, the nautical almanac of 2013.The results are with in 10-15 seconds which is accurate enough for sea. Please read the help carefully. The app contains can export the almanac data and celestial observations data to the external SD card.

Godinterest (the Christian version of Pinterest) allows Christians to collect and share photos of their favourite events, interests and hobbies. Godinterest acts as a bespoke Christian media platform, whereby users' content and the content of others can be browsed on the main page of the Godinterest beta app. _____________________________________ CHRISTIAN SOCIAL NETWORKING PLATFORM Inspired by the Need for Wholesome Content Sharing, Godinterest Offers a Pinterest alternative for those who want to share within a Christian environment. In the same way that Pinterest works Godinterest is a photo-driven platform. MISSION: Godinterest's mission is to connect Christians through the interests they share. Users can upload images and embed videos to boards, which can be used to organise images they love from around the web or from their very own work. BETA APP: Godinterest Beta App is a fun way to capture and share God's world in moments with family and friends. FEATURES: • Access to mobile version of site • Enables login or registration with Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn profiles • Allows you to take and upload photos directly from your mobile device or add YouTube video links. • Browse daily "Hot", "New" and "Top" rated photos • Comment on "photos" • Free registration includes access to all of the website's features. As this is a beta app, to access the full features of Godinterest login via a desktop computer at http://godinterest.com . _____________________________________ For those who want to maintain their Christian values while still interacting with those on the Internet, Godinterest could be a great option. With comparable features to Pinterest offered in a platform that is marketed as being safe for the entire family, the environment offered on Godinterest could be just what the Christian community is searching for. Capture and Share God's World in Moments _____________________________________ Website: http://Godinterest.com . Facebook page: http://facebook.com/godinterestUK Twitter page: http://twitter.com/godinterestUK Help Centre: godinterest.uservoice.com _____________________________________ Terms of use and Privacy Policy: http://godinterest.com/terms-of-use

About GooseTheArtist.com's app: I got my start when I was 5 drawing Spider-Man which quickly escalated in me making comics of my own. Not long after that I began practicing portraiture at a young age using the realistic techniques from that in more conceptual, dark and politically themed works. I have studied at Butler High School, Art Academy of Cincinnati and The Kentucky Center Governor’s School for the Arts. I am currently in my senior year of high school. Big things to come. Mark James on John Faughender - ” As a gallery owner, I have young people approach me regularly, wanting me to recognize their talent as the next great artist. I patiently explore their work, and offer what critique i can to help them grow. The critique is more often than not received as a rejection. I was introduced to John Faughender by a mutual friend who raved about him enough that I had my expectations set on more of the same. John arrived with a prepared portfolio, and the ability to discuss his art both conceptually and technically. As we explored his presentation, I came to see that John really had the potential to achieve greatness. My gallery focuses on finding artists that want to produce shows making relevant social commentary more so than technically adept pretty pictures or accessory art. John’s portfolio did not fit this profile, but his desire to learn and excel drove him to explore this idea, and after 2 rejected proposals, presented me with a concept, prepared sketches, and a willingness to take direction that resulted in his being given a solo show in April 2014. John is the artist that creates daily, explores the construct of his birth as an imperfect creation, and seeks to expose himself to the World through his creations. I have no doubt he will be the rare artist that matures early and becomes capable of showing the World to itself.

WhatsApp Messenger is a messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, and Voice Messages. First year FREE!* (WhatsApp may charge thereafter, current price is $0.99 USD/year). WHY USE WHATSAPP: • NO ADDITIONAL FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family, so you don’t have to pay for every message or call.* • MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, and Voice Messages. • WHATSAPP CALLING: Call your friends and family using WhatsApp for free, even if they’re in another country. WhatsApp calls use your phone’s Internet connection rather than your cellular plan’s voice minutes.* (Note: you can’t access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp). • GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family. • WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer’s browser. • NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There’s no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.* • SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone’s existing address book. • ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you’re always logged in so you don’t miss messages. No more confusion about whether you’re logged in or logged out. • QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there’s no need to add hard-to-remember usernames. • OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app. • AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, email chat history, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more! *Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. --------------------------------------------------------- We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at: android-support@whatsapp.com or follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/WhatsApp @WhatsApp ---------------------------------------------------------
release_text: • Google Drive Backup: You can now back up your chats and media to Google Drive, so if you lose your phone, switch or upgrade to a new Android phone, you can easily restore your chats and media. You can set up backups in Settings > Chats and Calls > Chat backup. • Starred messages: Now you can tap and hold on any message in a chat to star it so you can easily find it later (works like a bookmark). You can browse starred messages from the Chats tab > Menu > Starred Messages.

Five Hundred (500) is a fun and addictive 4 player card game with 2 teams of 2 players (3 CPU players). Teams bid how many tricks they think they will win and get rewarded points if they make their bid. The first team to reach 500 points wins. Features: - Extensive how to play guide. - All bid types available (including Closed Misere and Open Misere). - Advanced CPU players. - Ability to change individual CPU player difficulties. - Different table styles. If you have any suggestions, issues or other feedback, please email me at crazzledazzledev@gmail.com and if necessary I will try to get an update out asap. Enjoy playing Five Hundred! NOTE: If you are having problems with winning the bid you need to go to your phone's Settings->Developer Options and turn "Don't keep activities" to OFF. Five Hundred uses multiple activities so having this ON will cause problems. These settings should only be altered by developers for the purpose of testing apps. if your aim is to not keep apps in memory then get an app killer because your messing with the wrong thing! Keywords: Five Hundred 500 bridge card cards game spades hearts clubs diamonds euchre bidding bid trumps trick tricks
release_text: Increased card size for 7 inch tablet users.

description: You are a head of a company or a sales manager. You sell products or services trying to increase sales. Where do you keep your contacts? On sheets of paper? Do you put them in a day planner? In Excel? That's already all in the past. Let us introduce a fundamentally new product: Smarty CRM! This is a complete and intuitive tool to maintain the loyalty of your partners. With its help you can manage a database, set reminders, and record collaboration milestones. It even works offline. Opportunities — Personal and business contacts — Chats, communication with clients and partners — Goals (the system of setting goals) — Notes — Diary and organizer — NEW! File storage (available in the web version on smartycrm.com) — NEW! Import contacts from * .xls (available in the web version on smartycrm.com) Your work with each client (whether you like it or not) goes through a series of stages: establishing a new contact, identification of needs, presentation of a product, and so on. These are the basics of marketing — it is always this way, even if you have not thought about it. Smarty CRM allows you to see at what stage the client is, and suggests what activities are needed all in English. Smarty CRM has an understandable and easy-to-read interface, well-designed filters, and convenient searching. Your business can be seen at a glance. Set a reminder for a call or a meeting directly from the contact card with just a few taps. And your device will remind you about the event. Smarty CRM is a classic free cloud service enabling you to work online on Android as well as via a web browser. Synchronize data with the server and be sure that they will not be lost. If you encounter difficulties, contact us. We'll promptly help you deal with the problem or fix the errors. With Smarty CRM you will love your job as much as we do!

Virtually any website with a search feature can be added to Spiffy Search so that you can quickly and easily find what you need. Add a homescreen shortcut for easy access, or hold down the hardware search button to start searching even faster! Pick from more than 90 built-in searches, enter a site and have Spiffy Search try to add it automatically, or enter a new search by hand. Supports easy drag-and-drop reordering of searches. ________________________________________ As seen on: Meetroid - http://www.meetroid.com/?p=57210 Best Apps Market - http://www.bestappsmarket.com/p/app?id=111179&title=spiffy-search

description: Vytáčejí Vás telemarketingové agentury? Už jste někdy naletěli dotěrným prodejcům po telefonu? Snad každý majitel mobilního telefonu to zná. Zazvoní telefon a na druhém konci se ozve hlas pracovníka marketingové agentury se „skvělou nabídkou“ bankovních služeb, zaručeně levnějších energií, či jiných nepotřebných věcí. Případně s dotazem, zda máte pár minut na průzkum trhu, který však nakonec po dlouhých minutách hovoru vyústí stejně v hon na Vaši peněženku. Někdo chce být slušný a pracovníka na druhém konci alespoň vyslechne, někdo okamžitě pokládá. Asi se shodneme na tom, že podobné nevyžádané hovory většinou obtěžují, vyrušují a kradou Vám volný čas. Aplikace Nevolejte.cz nabízí řešení, jak daným nevyžádaným hovorům zabránit. Jednoduše řečeno, aplikace Nevolejte.cz je call blocker s komunitně budovanou databází čísel prodejců po telefonu, které uživatelé aplikace navzájem sdílí. Pokud je prodejce identifikován alespoň dvěma důvěryhodnými uživateli aplikace, je jeho číslo zablokováno u všech ostatních uživatelů a už se jim nedovolá. Kromě sdílené černé listiny čísel aplikace umí blokovat i individuální hovory od otravných lidí, s kterými si nepřejete hovořit. Aplikace byla záměrně navržena pouze s omezeným počtem nutných funkcí z důvodu, aby ji bylo jednoduché ovládat, a také aby nezpomalovala přítomností zbytečných funkcí rychlost běhu mobilního telefonu a nevybíjela zbytečně baterii. Klíčové vlastnosti aplikace jsou: - Blokování telefonních čísel ručně zadaných uživatelem - Blokování telefonních čísel převzatých z historie volání - Blokování telefonních čísel převzatých z kontaktů uložených v telefonu nebo na SIM kartě - Blokování hovorů na základně komunitně budované černé listiny telefonních čísel - Volitelně blokování hovoru ze skrytých telefonních čísel - Aplikace zobrazuje plnou historii blokovaných hovorů, tak aby uživatel měl přehled kdy a proč byl hovor odmítnut. - Aplikace informuje o zablokovaném hovoru uživatele systémovou notifikací, bez nutnosti sebe sama spouštět. - Aplikace umožňuje lokálně odblokovat telefonní číslo, které blokuje černá listina čísel. (pomocí podržení prstu na záznamu v historii blokovaných hovorů) - Automatický zápis do Registru Nevolejte.cz, kterým majitel telefonu zveřejňuje nesouhlas s marketingovými kontakty po telefonu. - Aplikace umožňuje plnou funkčnost bez internetového připojení. Internetové připojení je nutné pouze během ruční aktualizace černé listiny čísel. - Aplikace upozorňuje uživatele, pokud je lokální kopie černé listiny čísel zastaralá a je nutná její aktualizace. - Plná podpora dual SIM telefonů Prémiové funkce, které je možné získat dočasně zdarma ( více na www.nevolejte.cz/bonus ), jsou: - Automatická aktualizace černé listiny na pozadí bez nutnosti spouštět aplikaci - Prioritní verze černé listiny (běžní uživatelé dostávají aktuální podobu o den později) - Blokování všech telefonních čísel, které nemám uložené v kontaktech (vhodné pro dětské majitele mobilních telefonů) - Blokování příchozích SMS na základě černé listiny (na verzi androidu KitKat a vyšší aplikace pouze upozorňuje na přítomnost na černé listině, ale neblokuje, protože tato verze androidu blokaci neumožňuje ) - Možnost volitelně zapnout si blokování hovorů pouze mimopracovní hodiny (noci a víkendy) Spojme se společně v boji proti nevyžádaným telefonním hovorům! Pomozte budovat černou listinu prodejců po telefonu a zablokujme prodejce na svých mobilních telefonech jednou provždy. Pokud narazíte v aplikaci na nějaký problém případně Vám chybí nějaká užitečná funkce, neváhejte nás kontaktovat na mailu info@nevolejte.cz . Děkujeme. Craze you telemarketing agency? Have you ever been duped intrusive dealers over the phone? Perhaps every mobile phone owner knows it. The phone rings and on the other end will hear the voice of employee marketing agency with "great deals" banking services, guaranteed to cheaper energy, or other unnecessary things. Alternatively, asking if you have a few minutes to survey the market, which finally, after long minutes of conversation will result in the same hunt on your wallet. Someone wants to be a good worker on the other end at least hear someone immediately considered. Perhaps we can agree that such unsolicited calls usually annoy, disturb you and steal leisure. Application Nevolejte.cz offers a solution to a given prevent unsolicited calls. Simply put, the application is Nevolejte.cz call blocker with community-building a database of phone numbers of dealers that users share applications with each other. If the seller is identified by at least two trustees applications, the number is blocked for all other users and you will not let them. In addition to a shared blacklist application numbers can also block individual calls from annoying people with whom you do not talk. Application has been deliberately designed with a limited number of functions necessary for the reason that it was easy to control, and also to the presence of unnecessary features does not slow down the running speed of the mobile phone and the vehicle's battery unnecessarily. Key features of the application are: - Prevent phone numbers manually entered by the user - Blocking numbers taken from the call history - Blocking numbers taken from the contacts stored on your phone or SIM card - Prevent calls to essential community built blacklist phone numbers - Optional blocking calls from hidden numbers - The application displays the full history of blocked calls, so that the user have an overview of when and why the call was rejected. - The application informs the user about the blocked call system notifications without having to run itself. - The application allows locally unblock a phone number that is blocking blacklist numbers. (By holding down your finger on the record in the history of blocked calls) - Automatic enrollment in the Register Nevolejte.cz which phone owner publishes disagreement with marketing contacts over the phone. - The application allows full functionality without an Internet connection. Internet connection is only necessary during manual update blacklist numbers. - The application notifies the user if the local copy of the blacklist numbers outdated and it needs to be updated. - Full support for dual SIM phones Premium features, which can be obtained free of charge temporarily (more on www.nevolejte.cz/bonus) are: - Update the blacklist in the background without having to run the application - Priority version blacklist (ordinary users receive current appearance a day later) - Blocking of phone numbers that I have stored in your contacts (suitable for children of mobile phone owners) - Block incoming SMS based on blacklists (for Android version KitKat and higher application only draws attention to the presence on the blacklist, but not block, because this version of Android does not allow blocking) - Ability to optionally turn on a barring only non-work hours (nights and weekends) Let us join together in the fight against unsolicited phone calls! Help build a blacklist of vendors on the phone and lock vendor on their mobile phones once and for all. If you come in on a problem or we are missing some useful features, do not hesitate to contact us on e-mail info@nevolejte.cz . Thank you.
release_text: Změny v běžné verzi - Při vypnuté blokaci pomocí černé listiny aplikace aspoň varuje, že volající je na černé listině. - Opravena chyba v detekci přítomnosti Facebooku v mobilu. - Vylepšen komfort vkládání nových čísel. Změny v PREMIUM verzi - nová funkce blokující všechny hovory z čísel, které nejsou uložené v kontaktech (vhodné pro dětské uživatele telefonů) - nově blokujeme také SMS zprávy - umíme zapnout blokování hovorů pouze mimo pracovní dobu (noci, víkendy)

Receive mobile speedcam alerts in real time and be warned against all fixed speed cameras worldwide. ★★★★★ NEW: Blitzer.de PLUS available - ADVANTAGES ★★★★★ [✔]Landscape mode, simply turn your smartphone 90° [✔]Even faster updates in case of software bugs [✔]Support for Widget and Multi-Windows [✔]New features will always be available in the PLUS version first ★★★★★ Look for Blitzer.de PLUS in the MARKET ★★★★★ Install Blitzer.de for free now and be part of the large community of over 5 million participants all over the world. Review: http://goo.gl/8nFtC ★★★★★ OVERVIEW OF FUNCTIONS ★★★★★ + Real time alerts of mobile radar traps + More than 47,000 fixed speedcams worldwide from SCDB.info + Directional alerts for all fixed speedcams + Automatic updates every 5 minutes + Visual and acoustic warnings + Indication of device type and of legal speed limit + Simple alert function + Online/offline mode + Locations of fixed speedcams checked on site + Listening and radar view + Distance and direction of speedcam indicated System requirements: - Android operating system 2.x or higher - Internet access for online updates (flat rate recommended) - Internal GPS

*** NEW *** Use the Google Leaderboards to compare your performances with those of other players. BrainCise - Mental Arithmetic offers you the possibility to train mental arithmetic specifically and completely free of ads. In the current version the following training modes are available: + Sixty Seconds Solve as much problems of one type as possible within 60 seconds. As problem types there are addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, square a number and root extraction in up to seven difficulty levels selectable. Additionally, a personal ranking offers you an overview over your best results and keeps you motivated to improve yourself steadily. + Survive Receive time credits by solving problems to extend the duration of a game from 20 seconds to a maximum. Each wrong answer is imposed with a time penalty. The complexity of the problems increases with the duration of the game. There are three difficulty levels selectable which have an impact on the height of the given time credits. + Free Practise: Train addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, basic arithmetic operations, square a number, root extraction and decimal calculations as you want to and in up to seven difficulty levels. Because of diverse mathematical problem type and difficulty selection, BrainCise - Mental Arithmetic is suitable for every age group as well as skill level. Languages: English, German [calculate, maths, mathematics, mental arithmetic, mental math]
release_text: Version 2.3.0: + Integration of Google Leaderboards Version 2.2.0: + Animated countdown and bonus (Survive) + Display of personal best (Sixty Seconds, Survive) + Optimised time cheat check Version 2.1.2: + Fixed problem with hidden OK button on keypad + Extended OK button on keypad Version 2.1.1: + Fixed incorrect height of keypad

description: This program is designed for those who want to learn interesting mathematical tricks to speed up the calculating. These tricks will help solve part of the mathematical problems and tasks much faster than classical. Will also be helpful to those who want to hone basics such as the multiplication table. When you learn these mathematical tricks, you'll be able to show off your skills to friends and prove to them that you have a talent for mathematics. New skills you can use in the store, at school, at college, at work - wherever thanks to quick calculation skills can save a lot of precious time. Fun Math Tricks: 1. Addition 2. Subtraction 3. Multiplication table 4. Division 5. Multiply two digit number by 11 6. Square numbers ending in 5 7. Multiply by 5 8. Multiply by 9 9. Multiply by 4 10. Dividing by 5 11. Subtracting from 1000 12. Tough multiplication 13. Power of two 14. Adding numbers close to hundreds 15. Subtracting numbers close to hundreds 16. Multiply numbers between 11 and 19 17. Square numbers between 11 and 99 18. Multiply two digit numbers having same tens digit and ones digits add up to ten 19. Square numbers between 50 and 59 20. Square numbers between 40 and 49 21. Multiply two digit numbers editing in 1 22. Percent 23. Square numbers between 100 and 109 ... 84. n^9 Training mode: - 15 levels for every trick - timer 15 seconds Rating stars: - score > 000 - ★☆☆ - score > 350 - ★★☆ - score > 650 - ★★★ This free version of Math Tricks contains third party advertisements. The app uses the following APIs and libraries: * MPAndroidChart - created by Philipp Jahoda * ColorPIcker - created by Piotr Adamus
release_text: (As always, keep the feedback coming!) v111: 1. Fixed some bugs (font shadow - blur). 2. German (fixed translation errors). 3. Added Persian language.

description: A 3D rendered live wallpaper background of a tropical fish tank, with beautiful backgrounds and smooth motion. Double-tap to feed them! Triggerfish, clownfish, turtles, seahorses, jellyfish, lionfish, and more! Works as a daydream on 4.2+ devices! Customize your aquarium with up to 14 simultaneous fish! Change plants and backgrounds, select tank decorations, control the overhead light & bubbler! Use your own custom backgrounds, too! Our wallpapers take full advantage of OpenGL with minimal battery drain, and support both home screen scrolling and landscape/portrait modes! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers PERMISSIONS: External Storage needed for custom image support.

description: Snowfall is a beautiful live wallpaper featuring gentle snowflakes falling overtop swaying pine trees. Not a movie, with full support for landscape mode and home screen switching on any sized screen! Tilt your device to influence snow direction! Works as a daydream on 4.2+ devices! This full version has tons of settings for colors, Christmas lights, time of day tracking, camera speeds, Santa sightings, snow appearance, and more! PERMISSIONS: Coarse location is to allow calculation of accurate sunrise/sunset times! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Wallpapers
